newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH CNB SETS 39-WEEK T-BILL AUCTION FOR WED.
newsitem.headline: CZECH CNB SETS 39-WEEK T-BILL AUCTION FOR WED.

text.p: The Czech Finance Ministry will auction a six billion crown tranche of treasury bills on Wednesday, the Czech National Bank (CNB) said on Tuesday.
The CNB said gross yield in the Dutch-style auction was set at 18.0 percent, while net yield was set at 13.5 percent.

In the last auction of similar paper on March 27, gross yield hit 11.58 percent. The auction was heavily-oversubscribed with bids totalling 9.83 billion crowns. The CNB accepted bids totalling 4.999 billion crowns in the auction of a five billion crown tranche of 39-week T-bills.
